text: Ezɨ Godɨn Duam arazir aghuir kabar amuasava en naviba fe: arazir bar igharaz darazigh ifongezim, navir amɨrazim ko bar akongezim, dughorir amɨrazim, gumazibar akurvagha, egha arazir aghuibar me gami. Egha guizbangɨra mɨgɨa deravɨra bizibagh amua, gumazibar asughasusi, egha navir ghurimɨn araziba dɨkabɨri. Moses Osirizir Arazitam arazir kabar anegoroghezir puvatɨ.
